com.topcoder.util.errorhandling
Class CauseUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.util.errorhandling.CauseUtils
public class CauseUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Utility Class maintained to provide backwards compatibility with Base Exception 1.0.

As this component is to be used in an environment with automatic exception chaining (java 1.4 and later), this is not required, but for compatibility it has been provided, its single method rewritten to match the new technology.

Thread safety: The class is stateless to ensure thread safety.

Since:
1.0
Version:
2.0
Author:
srowen, Sleeve, sql_lall, TCSDEVELOPER

Method Detail

getCause

public static java.lang.Throwable getCause(java.lang.Throwable t)
Deprecated. As of Base Exception 2.0, simply calling Throwable's own getCause() method in JDK 1.4 or newer

Returns the throwable reason which caused the given exception.

Parameters:
t - The object whose cause is being retrieved.
Returns:
The throwable cause that triggered the given throwable object.

1.0
